title: Goliath Bird-Eating Spiders: Giant Arachnids
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 292 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 520L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Q and Z
description: Goliath bird-eating spiders can be as large as a dinner plate, but they are more than just big. Students will enjoy learning all about these eight-legged giants and looking at the exciting images that support the text.
